title: ISic002750. I.Sicily inscription 002750
body:
Facsimile Images

Ἐνθάδε κ̣[εῖται]
Νώνιος Πι̣[---]
τέκτων κάλ̣[λιστόν]
ποτε τοῦτον [ἀ]νεῖ-
5λε κίων καὶ Μοῖρα
ὃς κατέλειψε πατρὶ
λύπην δεινοτάτην
ἔζησε ἔτη κ̣β´

Apparatus criticus

Text after Manganaro 1994 but controlled with autopsy/photograph; Manganaro: ιβ’

English translation

Here lies Nonios Pi[--], a carpenter. A column and Fate snatched away this once most handsome man, who left behind the most wretched grief for his father. He lived 22 years.

commentary

A verse distych begins midway through line 3.

bibliography

  • 44.0748 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000796
  • 1953.0279 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001282
  • Manganaro 1994 102 no. 17 fig. 22 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001825
  • Libertini 1949 94 no. 2 fig. 2 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001865
  • 44.0738 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000796
